adrFormatAddress: 272 W 125th St #278, New York, NY 10027, USA

editorialSummary.text: Retail chain with brand-name athletic shoes, clothing & related accessories for men, women & kids.

originalText.text: This Kids Footlocker was clean...helpful staff...let me take my time and prices were good. I left this store very happy with my purchase.

text.text: This Kids Footlocker was clean...helpful staff...let me take my time and prices were good. I left this store very happy with my purchase.

No complaints.

originalText.text:
There's seems to be no way for the employees to figure out what shoe models they have in a specific size, so everytime you choose a model you like, they have to check the individual inventory for that shoe. They can other will not tell you if they have the size you're looking for in a different color of the shoe model you're interested in.

When they don't have your size they come back to you telling you about the other sizes they have for that model, even when those sizes are nowhere close to the one you're interested in. I.e. You're looking for a kids' size 3 but they'll tell you they have 11 and 12. It's not like they have a 2.5 and you could try that on in the off chance it fits.

Assuming the size is available, then they have to go downstairs to physically bring the shoes, and that's a production. It can take them a long time to return with your shoe size, and even then there's still a chance they might come empty handed because they don't actually have the shoe in inventory. And no, this is not an isolated incident, it can happen quite a few times during the same shopping experience.

On top of it, even though it seems like there is an incentive program in place to reward the employees for helping customers buy the shoes, some employees show a genuine lack of interest in helping you, which makes the process even lengthier. They tend to take longer to figure out if they have the size, bring the shoe etc.

All these inefficiencies add up and make the shopping experience unnecessarily long and unpleasant, which is really unfortunate because the store has a great selection of sneakers.

originalText.text:
A wonderful first time experience, Angie is a 5 star super star!! She helped me with a pair of vans and other items. Very professional and serviced with a smile.
A friendly face in such a crazy time.
Thank you!

text.text:

A friendly face in such a crazy time.
Thank you!

originalText.text: I spent over 400 dollars and asked if I can please get no tax or discount. Spoke to some manager who stated he was part time and another women. Who stated tax was the law. No customer service appreciation and not a simple thank you for shopping was given. I would never shop here again. I didn't want to hurt my son's feelings that's why I didn't void transaction.
